00001 from molDynamics.gulp.forcefields.OneAtomPotential import OneAtomPotential
00002 from os import linesep
00003 
00004 class SpringGulp(OneAtomPotential):
00005     '''representation of spring potential for gulp'''
00006     class Inventory(OneAtomPotential.Inventory):
00007         import pyre.inventory as inv
00008         k2Fit = inv.str("Fit k2", default = None)
00009         k2Fit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00010         k2Fit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00011                 
00012     def __init__(self, atom1):
00013         OneAtomPotential.__init__(self, atom1)
00014         self.ii=self.inventory
00015         
00016     def write(self):
00017         'writes the potential'
00018         return "spring "\
00019             + self.ii.atom1+' '\
00020             + str(self.potential["k2"])+' '\
00021             + self.getIfDefinedSpace(self.ii.k2Fit) + linesep
